website_summaries.verdict: This ridiculously inexpensive set is a wonderful choice for small families wanting a cheaper craft.
pros: Set includes 6 different colors of sand and 3 bottles
Scoop and funnel helps projects stay mess-free
Bottle stoppers are made out of cork
cons: Customers wish the product came with more sand

customer_reviews.title: I love the spoon and funnel it comes with
customer_reviews.text: Made ours this morning. I made it with my almost 4 year old and now she wants to do more. I love the spoon and funnel it comes with. She had no problem doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Fun project for four year old
customer_reviews.text: Kit comes with sand in pkgs (8 colors), a funnel, a scooper, a design stick to move the sand around in the bottle , 3” plastic bottles(3), and cork stoppers (3). My 4 yo grandson loved using the scooper to pour sand in the funnel and filling up the bottle, He wants to do the “sand activity” again. Be sure to place an old sheet or something on the floor to catch the spills. Then,throw away the whole mess instead of trying to clean it up - it is VERY fine sand. Might be better to make it an outside activity, if there is no wind
customer_reviews.author: Bett

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy craft
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun craft for my daughter. The kit comes with plastic bottles of different shapes and various colors of sand. You can make your own sand design however you like using the scoop and funnel provided. We put a paper towel under the bottles when they were filled and that made clean up of spilled sand easy. My daughter filled one bottle with straight colored stripes, held one at an angle so the stripes go higher to one side, and in the last bottle she mixed the colors some so the colors gradually changed instead of the hard lines. The corks fit tightly and keep the bottle securely closed. They look great and she's proud to display them.
customer_reviews.author: W. Simpsen

customer_reviews.title: Good price, decent product, some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, kids enjoyed it. The sand all mixes together and you lose the sand design you created. The lid just shoves into the top, we added a little super glue to ensure it would stay closed. High level of enjoyment from the kids and decent price, would order again.
customer_reviews.author: PackdHouse

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity for 2 and 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: A fun carnival classic I remember enjoying as a child. So wonderful my children enjoyed making these. The only suggestion I have is sealing the tops with a hot glue gun to keep the sand from shifting and cork from popping off. The cork alone is not secure enough to stay on, especially when the kids play with it. They provide just enough sand to fill the 3 bottles. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: mama

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is well made for the price and im sire my 3 year old will enjoy it. The only diwn said is the green sand had small hole in it cause is to loss half the sand in shipping and it got all over everything in the box in the process including anther order that was boxed with this. Im a little sad to be missing some sand but my 3 year old will not know the difference so we shall keep it and enjoy it. Would buy it again as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thelindz123

customer_reviews.title: Nice small activity
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 year old for Christmas and it was a hit. It had enough sand to have extra after the bottles were full. The only downfall is its obviously not a toy they can keep playing with, and it didnt take her long to fill them all.
customer_reviews.author: Snfrank527

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit, it has everything you need, just enough sand to fully fill all three bottles. Easy for kids to do on their own. The end product looks really nice and i love the cork tops instead of the plastic ones that often come with these that cheapen the look.
customer_reviews.author: Excellent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good craft for kids, mine are 6 & 9
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a craft for the kids during this quarantine and they had a fun time doing it! They liked having a craft they could keep and display as well 👌🏻 It didn’t take them a long time but I now know they like it I would get refills to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Great gift to keep my nephews busy during quarantine
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to send my nephews some things to keep them busy (and out of mom's hair) during quarantine. They are both age 4. This was a great gift. They loved getting to play with the sand and make their own art. Comes as advertised. They get to do 3 sand bottles. Good variety of colors. Good product overall and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jay K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Craft For A Child
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit for my 4 year old nephew and I to do as a little craft together. He had a blast and was very excited to use all of the different colors, and gave them as presents to his parents when they came back from vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J

customer_reviews.title: Fun art for kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my kids so they can have some fun and be creative. The bottles feel very cheap. One bottle had a small Crack. The kids still had fun creating their own sand art. It comes with some tools which makes it easy to pour the sand into. It will get messy but kids do enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Wu

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for me 3 year old twins and they loved them. This was there first time doing them and although I wish the package was bigger they enjoyed playing with it. Would definitely recommend for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great craft for children
customer_reviews.text: Nice craft for children. My only complaint is the bottles are plastic. If the bottles were of quality glass the colors of sand could be more visible and the planet would be in better shape. As a society we use too much plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Activity to do with Kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my niece as a potty-training reward. She is into all things art and this was an activity that did not dissapoint. She was very excited to do the activity and now she has a neat little decoration that will be a memory of an activity she did with her Uncle. Great quality product as per usual with Melissa & Doug.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Castonguay

customer_reviews.title: Nice craft
customer_reviews.text: Fun little activity to keep the kids busy, work in turn taking and fine motor skills. Several bottles included and plenty of sand. Only one funnel so kids have to take turns.
customer_reviews.author: Cmbv23

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as represented, though they entertain your child for ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as represented, though they entertain your child for about 8 minutes, then they're done, and you have more little things taking up space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT ENOUGH SAND TO FILL 3RD BOTTLE!
customer_reviews.text: Pool quality. There werent enough sand to fill the last bottle and we didn't spill at all. There should ve at least more than enough to fill all bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando D.

customer_reviews.title: A great time with grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun making these from a one year old, 3 year, 4 yr, 5 yr and 53 yr! I remember doing this with my daughter when she was a little girl!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE TELLEZ

customer_reviews.title: Very short lived excitement
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what's described, but expensive for a gift that will only entertain the little one for 10 minutes. Not really much to do with it given the relatively small amount of sand. Plus, as expected, the kids just shake it all up!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Miller Runfola

customer_reviews.title: Easy and kids adore
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this and still talk about it a week later. As a parent, I loved that everything we needed was right there in the box. I've got one 5 year old boy that is all about arts and crafts and another 5 year old boy who couldn't care less about any of it. They both enjoyed this without any urging and are super proud of their artwork!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend's son. He's a 4 year old little boy and had a blast making these.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I babysit kids and they had fun making these. Only thing is the sand bags are not resealable so we felt we had to make all of them in one sitting.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great preschool craft
customer_reviews.text: All my kids love doing sand art for our preschool craft! 3 of the bottles are great for toddlers, the 4th however is a thin squiggly one that won't stand up on it's own. we ended up just removing that bottle and letting the kids fill up the others.They had a blast! and for the price its an easy project that everyone loves! Will definitely be ordering more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Special needs mom

customer_reviews.title: fun for family
customer_reviews.text: very cute sand art,we spend with my 3 y.o. daughter around 30 minutes to fill this bottles with the sand:) it was funny,very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Aloxa

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Really fun craft for my girls to play with. Would be a great present and fun idea to entertain kids. Just do it outside because the sand can get everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Good kit but won’t entertain for long
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice kit but your child will be done in 10mins. I bought it to keep my child busy during covid19 stay home order but his won’t last you long.
customer_reviews.author: yasuko toeda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used to put ashes from pets into art. Worth the money. Love the colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sand.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute and affordable little set but There wasn’t enough sand to fill all three containers with minimal spilling. Luckily I only have two kids but someone using all three containers would have some disappointed kids
customer_reviews.author: KelMV

customer_reviews.title: Fun family craft
customer_reviews.text: So fun my kids had a blast, kinda messy but that’s any craft with children. Each one came out unique and my kids were so proud of their art work. Would definitely recommend and may buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sand!
customer_reviews.text: While this was fun and my granddaughter and I enjoyed filling the bottles, there just wasn't enough sand to fill all three bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: SAND LEAKED ALL OVER THE SHIPPING BOX!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy! One of the bags of sand was opened and leaked all over the box! Now looking for a different last minute Christmas gift for my grand daughter. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Constance Ory

customer_reviews.title: Leaky sand
customer_reviews.text: This arrived damaged, at least 1 sand bag broke open and leaked inside the box. Sand everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: UTmama

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old loved this product..it is a typical kiddy toy and the tools are quite flimsy so I ended up just pouring in the sand but overall you get 4 bottles and just enough sand to fill it all..only downside is the way it was packaged allowed the blue sand to “pop” and it spilled all inside the box..
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: My son had fun doing these
customer_reviews.text: My son had fun doing these. It took me a couple of tries to get the sand in tight, and it still isn't perfect. As soon as you move it the layers mix up. The ones that we have on his dresser for decoration are cute and have stayed in layers because I didn't let him handle them after we put it together. This is a cute set and kids of many ages would like doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Gunde31

customer_reviews.title: a great beach vacation activity
customer_reviews.text: a great beach vacation activity. Everything is sealed nicely, so you could even unpack it from the hefty box and stick it all in a small Ziploc for easy plane travel... or keep the box & lid as "trays" to catch all the sand. We did this outside after lunch as a quiet activity. My 5 year old and 2 year old LOVED it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome project!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter to learn about making patterns in sand. She has done all but one and each one is a bit different. She has learned how to make the layers different and how to shape the layers as well. She has done a great job. This is something easy for her to do without much of a mess. What she does spill (which is little) can be vacuumed up. I would suggest this for those that have kids that like little crafts.
customer_reviews.author: David B Pyl

customer_reviews.title: Fun project for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute project to do with little ones, bottles are small but plenty of sand to fill for the three of them with leftover Incase they make a mess!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: So fun! We have bought 3 of these, and they make great gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Great craft for kids. Bought it as a gift and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelliyah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift that keeps giving. It comes with 3 project bottles and enough sand to fill them all. Can’t wait for my little guy to make them and pass them to family members.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute sand art set for my six year old. Wish they made a bigger set.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as party favors for my daughter’s birthday. Kids loved them and parents did too. Note: be careful because the cork easily comes out.
customer_reviews.author: ELee

customer_reviews.title: Sand bottles
customer_reviews.text: There was not enough sand to fill all the bottles. There should have been more in each color pkg
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice activity for y children who are stuck in the house
customer_reviews.author: 🇯🇲Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best sand art product and I love Melissa and Doug
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and easy! My 3yr old niece loved making em!
customer_reviews.author: angela christine

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Easy
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loved this craft! It was fun and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Sand sticks to plastic
customer_reviews.text: The sand sticks to the inside walls of the plastic bottles like static no matter what you do to scrape it free with the tool. The result is an unclean design with colors where you don't intend them to be.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My six year old had an amazing time with this sand kit.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah

customer_reviews.title: Clean family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids! Great price! My 6yr old son enjoyed doing these on a rainy day!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: that is fine with me
customer_reviews.text: Bottles are of the right size. Sand bags are not big. But, that is fine with me. I do not need too much sand. Colors of the sand are bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fun craft for boys or girls
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old granddaughter really enjoyed this activity! It was easy for her on her own. My only complaint is I wish it had more in the kit. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 1 and 3 yr old loved this, but it only peovided about 15 minutes of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. The plastic pieces are smaller than I thought. Looks bigger in picture.
customer_reviews.author: fretting

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for my son's birthday. He absolutely loved it and it was something fun we could do together!
customer_reviews.author: Baleigh Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great gift option for creative kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old niece enjoyed this gift - she needed help from her mom but came up with some very pretty designs. Her 8 year old sister enjoyed making up the bottles too.
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: It has the idea of making sand art bottles but the packaging and the bottles are really cheap. Just plastic bottles kind of a small kit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love making these and this is a very nice set
customer_reviews.author: Norma Suda

customer_reviews.title: My daughters loved these. They were super excited to use them
customer_reviews.text: My daughters loved these. They were super excited to use them. It kept them busy for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love sand art
customer_reviews.text: The kids had fun with this sand art. We even had a little sand left over. The bottles are only a few inches high. This is more for smaller children. The spoon and pick brush came in handy too.
customer_reviews.author: LoriAnn19787

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pink sand exploded inside and outside the boxes. Had to clean up the whole kit
customer_reviews.author: Lakara wittenzellner

customer_reviews.title: Nicer bottles would help.
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are cheap plastic and the cork is hard to get in so that there isn't some empty space for the sand to shift around in. Otherwise my 4 year old loved this project. The scoop and the funnel made for little to no mess.
customer_reviews.author: N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun little project for kids
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved doing this! Everything you need is included, enough sand for 3 full bottles and extra to spill lol My daughters are 3.5 and 20 months old and they did great with my help of course. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: nicole bailey

customer_reviews.title: Overall the product is fine. However
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is fine. However, they really don't give you enough sand. Perhaps they give you exactly enough. However, some sand gets lost while doing the project and there was not enough sand to fill all 3 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gift as a birthday gift for my nieces and they love it!! Very affordable and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kaliyah Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! It was shipped on time and the product was as advertised. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son loves doing sand art can't wait too see him making the bottles up.
customer_reviews.author: christine barkley

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sand
customer_reviews.text: Not enough sand! Hard to make a Pattern bc colors ran out. And didn’t even fill all bottles regardless of pattern. Surprised it’s rated so high.
customer_reviews.author: BMM5

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Larger sand bags would have been nice
customer_reviews.text: Fun! Larger sand bags would have been nice, but my son loved making art!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Seate-beck

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for independent use!
customer_reviews.text: I liked how this sand art kit came with a scoop, sand, bottles, and a funnel! My twins LOVED this quality and affordability kit!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift for a 3-7 year old girl or boy. They will want to make all the bottles at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Caribbean N18 W66

customer_reviews.title: Good as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Great little set but smaller sand holders than desired, I'm happy with it because the price was reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoyed making the sand bottle we did a video of this item on our facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Desarae Aina

customer_reviews.title: Small sand art bottles are a fine introduction
customer_reviews.text: Fun quick craft. The bags are small but for the price I expected that. It kept my 5 year old busy for about an hour and she is very happy just pouring the mixed up leftover sand through the funnel now.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! We had a blast making them and I wish I got more!
customer_reviews.author: MDavis

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present for niece
customer_reviews.text: This was for my middle niece's birthday. She loves to draw and create things and I thought it would be a good project for her. It seemed ok, a little smaller than I expected, but she liked it
customer_reviews.author: Tamcan

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for my Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for my Grandson. Good fine motor,pouring in, had fun deciding which color,when. Proud when done. Hard to find art projects for little boys, that they really like.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for a 4 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 4 year old girl. She loves it all!! She is already asking for more!

customer_reviews.title: Super cure design and very soft
customer_reviews.text: I use these types of blankets daily. Can't beat this price! Super cure design and very soft, too! Love them

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a seven year old
customer_reviews.text: Seven year old daughter really enjoyed putting these together on Christmas morning.

customer_reviews.title: just enough sand even for spills
customer_reviews.text: Came in time. 7 yr old boy loves these. Little but still kept his attention for 30 mins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Melissa and Doug products are the best. Well made, lots of fun.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my niece loved this, and it kept her occupied for a while too!!;)

customer_reviews.title: Nice family entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Me, my wife and son spend our time happily making a bottle each with our daughter.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product will buy again! Works great for what I needed A+

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller side but we still were able to create nice
customer_reviews.text: it was on the smaller side but we still were able to create nice art

customer_reviews.title: Every kid loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit for the kids at my son's bday party. Every kid loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Love Melissa and Doug
customer_reviews.text: Hard to go wrong with any of their crafts. My grand children loved this activity and so did I. Pretty tidy, I love that it isn't having to work with paint.

customer_reviews.title: Great Craft!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas 2012. She absolutely loves it! Just not enough of it in the box, but for the money, you get enough!

customer_reviews.title: Stopper missing
customer_reviews.text: My preschooler enjoyed this set, but one of the bottles' corks was missing.

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old daughter loves it. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loves it. I had to buy some more as presents and they were a success.

customer_reviews.title: A+++ from a 10 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. She loves them! We bought extra sand to go along with it so we can create many more to give out as gifts to her friends !

customer_reviews.title: Great activity for the kids!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 8 boxes for my daughter's birthday party and this sand art was a hit, highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.title: Fun!

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter for us to make on a rainy inside type of day. She had fun making the jars, the sand colors were pretty too. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set of toy
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful set of toy. Very easy set up and not messy.

customer_reviews.text: Got these for kids birthday party, they had fun but the final product is kind of small. Perhaps better to buy sand and bottles separately if you want a larger craft.

customer_reviews.text: My sister always wanted some of these and she was delighted with these ! They are easy and very pretty !

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Sand Art Bottles
product_meta.description:
Style:Melissa & Doug Sand Art BottlesAdd a pinch of this color and a scoop of that color to create a unique sand art project. Three plastic bottles with stoppers, six bags of vividly colored sand, a brush and a scoop await inspiration. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: Create a unique sand art project.
Includes 3 plastic bottles with stoppers, 6 bags of vividly colored sand, design tool, funnel, and scoop.
Easy to use--simply scoop and funnel the colours into the jars to create cool layers and swirls!
Promotes fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and creative expression.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars703 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
